rule: The category "Sports" is defined as news articles that pertain to athletic events, sports teams, individual athletes, competitions, or related sports activities.
input: The upcoming Olympics face challenges due to global health concerns.
validityText:
The input provided is a single sentence that serves as a headline rather than a complete news article. According to the input specification, the input must be a string containing the text of a complete news article suitable for classification into one of the specified categories.
